message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $160?
I understand your position, but $160 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
